name: investment-portfolio-mvp
description: Full-stack investment portfolio management with FastAPI backend and Next.js frontend

scripts.start:concurrent: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix name --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta"
scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:backend: cd flexpesa-ai && python -m venv venv && (venv/bin/activate || venv\Scripts\activate.bat) && pip install -r requirements.txt && python scripts/init_data.py
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.docs: echo 'API docs available at http://localhost:8000/docs when backend is running'
scripts.status: echo 'Frontend: http://localhost:3000' && echo 'Backend API: http://localhost:8000' && echo 'API Docs: http://localhost:8000/docs'

author: Investment Portfolio Team
